descriptionHtml:
[center]

[img] http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2854/9386453496_c2af9917da_c.jpg [/img]

(Description under construction.)

This is an Assassin's Creed inspired armor that is male, female and beast race compatible.
The female version is compatible with all body types but is not made for any one in particular.

The armor is made up of::
Outfit
Boots
Gauntlets
Sleeve Blades
Hood
Mask(Not beast race or female compatible.)
Belted Blades
Pouch
Pauldron
Pauldron + Cape


The armor is a bit OP, I'm not very good with stat balancing, haha.

Can be crafted at the forge under Iron and upgraded at the workbench.


This mod uses biped slots 60-57 and 45, so anything using those slots will conflict with this mod.


Highly recommended mods::

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33391//?]Face Masks by volvaga0[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13551//?]Blindfolds by volvaga0[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24977/?]Hidden Blade Sound FX by zinzen99[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20211/?]Altairs dagger by Shrinkingcash[/url]

Be sure to take screenshots of your awesome characters! I'd love to see them!


[youtube]p4ufj7YOVOc[/youtube][youtube]72qoevkVpcA[/youtube]

[youtube]7lEgUGxv_Y0[/youtube][youtube]4ph4TwNbAKo[/youtube]
--------------------------

Requirements:

Dawnguard + Dragonborn and probably the latest Skyrim patch.


--------------------------
Installation:

Use the Nexus Mod Manager to install or

Copy all content to the Skyrim/Data folder.

--------------------------
Uninstallation:

Remove the following folders:

Data\textures\DreamBurrow\RegalRanger
Data\meshes\DreamBurrow\RegalRanger

Or uninstall using NMM.


---------------------------

Known Issues:

Poor quality, I'm still learning a lot about texturing.

Clipping issues. This is a my first big mashup project so there will be some issues with clipping. I tried my
best to eliminate as much of them as possible.

Mask is only male compatible and does not work for beast races.


---------------------------
Permissions:

This is a Nexus mods exclusive.
I do NOT give permission for this mod to be uploaded to Steam or anywhere else without my consent.
Thank you. ^^


---------------------------

Credits:

Bethesda - Skyrim
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1859373/? ]Scottmack[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/55918/? ]Nivea[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3656551/?? ]Hothtrooper44[/url] - For assets used from their [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36079/? ]Gladiator Armor[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3100441/? ]L0rd0fWar[/url] - Rigging and Meshes from his [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5588//? ]The Witcher 2 Mod[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1051550/? ]nausicaa36[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/293510/?]zotman12 (Hentai)[/url] - Meshes from the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14651/?]Nightmare Armor[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2327413/?]TH3WICK3D1[/url] - Mask mesh from his [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7807//?]Witcher 2 - Viper Assassin-Blue Stripes Mod[/url].

If you feel that I have used your work and have not given proper credit please message me::
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4543751/?


---------------------------
Special Thanks.
There are a couple of people I want to thank for helping me through the process of creating this mod.
Urshi - for testing and helping me find bugs.
Hothtrooper44 and SydneyB - For being awesome and helping me when I need help with mesh issues.
83Willow and VictoriaG - For testing an taking lovely screenshots.
Nightasy - This mod would not have been made if it were not for his amazing tutorials.

And you, thank you for downloading my mod! I hope you enjoy despite some issues! (^-^)/
[/center]
